xwikidoc.title: Solr Search Translations
xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: solr.admin.title=Solr Search Administration ### Missing: solr.admin.submit=Apply ### Missing: solr.admin.error.notallowed=You are not allowed to perform this action. ### Missing: solr.admin.error.norights=Administration rights are required to access this section.
### Missing: solr.admin.status.title=Status ### Missing: solr.admin.status.queueSize.label=Queue Size ### Missing: solr.admin.status.queueSize.hint=The number of entities that are left to be indexed, re-indexed or deleted from the index (depending on the executed action).
### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.title=Indexing ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.label=Action ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.hint=The action to perform on the index. ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.select_index=Add to index ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.select_delete=Delete from index ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.select_reindex=Reindex ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.wiki.label=Wiki ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.wiki.hint=The wiki for which all its documents will be affected by the selected action. ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.wiki.select_farm=Entire farm ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.query.label=Custom query ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.query.hint=Optional query to limit the documents that will be affected by the selected action in the index.
solr.sortBy=Sorteren op: solr.sortBy.score=Relevantie solr.sortBy.title_sort=Titel solr.sortBy.date=Datum solr.sortBy.author_display_sort=Laatste auteur ### Missing: solr.sortBy.filename_sort=File Name ### Missing: solr.sortBy.attsize_sort=File Size ### Missing: solr.sortBy.attdate_sort=Upload Date ### Missing: solr.sortBy.attauthor_display_sort=Uploaded By solr.sortOrder.asc=Oplopend solr.sortOrder.desc=Aflopend
